subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A grind-it-out halfcourt offense and timely defense enabled seventh-seeded Notre Dame  to upset No. 2 Pitt in the quarterfinals of the Big East tournament.
snippet: A grind-it-out halfcourt offense and timely defense enabled seventh-seeded Notre Dame  to upset No. 2 Pitt in the quarterfinals of the Big East tournament.
